httpResponse.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<definitions xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://tempuri.org/" targetNamespace="http://tempuri.org/">
  <types>
    <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://tempuri.org/">
      <!-- Mock WSDL for development -->
    </schema>
  </types>
  <message name="RequestEmailOTPRequest">
    <part name="parameters" element="tns:RequestEmailOTP"/>
  </message>
  <message name="RequestEmailOTPResponse">
    <part name="parameters" element="tns:RequestEmailOTPResponse"/>
  </message>
  <portType name="MyTrustSignerAgentPortType">
    <operation name="RequestEmailOTP">
      <input message="tns:RequestEmailOTPRequest"/>
      <output message="tns:RequestEmailOTPResponse"/>
    </operation>
  </portType>
  <binding name="MyTrustSignerAgentBinding" type="tns:MyTrustSignerAgentPortType">
    <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/>
    <operation name="RequestEmailOTP">
      <soap:operation soapAction="RequestEmailOTP"/>
      <input><soap:body use="literal"/></input>
      <output><soap:body use="literal"/></output>
    </operation>
  </binding>
  <service name="MyTrustSignerAgentService">
    <port name="MyTrustSignerAgentPort" binding="tns:MyTrustSignerAgentBinding">
      <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/MTSAPilot/MyTrustSignerAgentWSAPv2"/>
    </port>
  </service>
</definitions>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
  <soap:Body>
    <GetCertInfoResponse>
      <statusCode>0000</statusCode>
      <message>Certificate info retrieved successfully</message>
      <certStatus>Valid</certStatus>
      <validFrom>2024-01-01T00:00:00Z</validFrom>
      <validTo>2025-01-01T00:00:00Z</validTo>
      <certSerialNo>DEV123456789</certSerialNo>
      <issuer>CN=MyTrust Development CA</issuer>
      <subject>CN=Test User,O=Development</subject>
      <userCert>LS0tLS1CRUdJTiBDRVJUSUZJQ0FURS0tLS0tDEV2Q0VSVElGSUNBVEUtLS0tLQ==</userCert>
    </GetCertInfoResponse>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
  <soap:Body>
    <VerifyPDFSignatureResponse>
      <statusCode>0000</statusCode>
      <message>PDF signature verified successfully</message>
      <totalSignatureInPdf>1</totalSignatureInPdf>
      <signatureDetails>
        <signature>
          <signerName>Test User</signerName>
          <signedDate>2024-01-01T12:00:00Z</signedDate>
          <isValid>true</isValid>
          <certStatus>Valid</certStatus>
        </signature>
      </signatureDetails>
    </VerifyPDFSignatureResponse>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>
